label: 職
本: The Kamakura Bakufu:  A Study in Documents . Stanford University Press . 1976
説明文: Originally a function or office with attached perquisites; later the right to designated income (with or without duties) under title of an office." The bureaucratic (and therefore temporary) quality of shiki eventually gave way to that which was private and permanent, and the post often became hereditary. Several shiki levels might conjointly possess an individual unit of land."
